sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Person } from './models/person'; import { Subject } from './models/subject'; import { PersonService } from './services/person.service'; import { SubjectService } from './services/subject.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { @Input() person: Person = new Person; form: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', [ Validators.email, Validators.required ]), name: new FormControl(null, [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(2) ]), phone: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required ]), message: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required ]), }); title = 'SofTrust.UI'; subjects: Subject[] = [] person1: Person[] = [] constructor( private subjectServices: SubjectService, private personService: PersonService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.subjectServices .getSubjects() .subscribe((result: Subject[]) => (this.subjects = result)); } CreatePerson(person: Person) { this.personService .createPerson(person) .subscribe((result: Person[]) => (this.person1 = result)); } }

Напишите Нам

Поле Имя не может быть пустым Длина дожна быть не менее 2 символа

Поле email не может быть пустым Некорретный email

Поле Телефон не может быть пустым


Поле Сообщение не может быть пустым
